speakers.text: His counsel will have raised them.  And -- and most, if not all, of those have to have been raised by counsel.

speakers.name: JUSTICE GINSBURG
speakers.text: Are you familiar with the Halbert case?  You mentioned that there might be a finality problem in Harris.

speakers.name: CHIEF JUSTICE REHNQUIST
speakers.text: Thank you, Mr. Moran. Mr. Casey, you have 3 minutes left.

speakers.name: JUSTICE KENNEDY
speakers.text: Did you waive the objection to prudential standing --

speakers.name: JUSTICE GINSBURG
speakers.text: Did you file a brief in opposition in Halbert?

speakers.name: JUSTICE GINSBURG
speakers.text: And does that have any procedural impediments?

speakers.name: JUSTICE GINSBURG
speakers.text: So what was the basis for your opposition to cert?

speakers.name: CHIEF JUSTICE REHNQUIST
speakers.text: Thank you, Mr. Casey. The case is submitted.
